extension.name: AcyMailing Tag : Website links
extension.author: Acyba
extension.copyright: Copyright (C) 2009-2015 ACYBA SAS - All rights reserved..
extension.description: This plugin enables you to add links in your Newsletter such as "read in your browser" or "forward to a friend"

param.name: help
param.label: Help
param.description: Click on the help button to get some help

param.name: addkey
param.label: Add Newsletter key
param.description: Add the Newsletter key in the link so the online version will be always accessible from the link inserted in the Newsletter

param.name: adduserkey
param.label: Add User key
param.description: Add the user key in the link so the online version will contain the personal information as well

param.name: viewtemplate
param.label: Display the online version - DEPRECATED
param.description: This option is not useful any more, please use the option when inserting the tag instead

param.name: forwardtemplate
param.label: Display the forward version - DEPRECATED
param.description: This option is not useful any more, please use the option when inserting the tag instead

param.name: frontendaccess
param.label: Front-end Access
param.description: You can restrict the access to this tag system with this option
param.option: Don't display this tag system on the front-end
